segments.text: I notice the boy balancing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall any second now, and that stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Neither of them seems to care about the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this—someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy’s hand is stuck in the jar—he’s pulling too hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should step in before something worse happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
